name: WarlockMaggie's Controller rolls - Season 26
description: Recommendations based on WarlockMaggie's breakdowns on r/sharditorkeepit for Controller on Season 26 weapons.

data.description:
A Sudden Death is what you'll be giving unfortunate enemies with this shotgun! As the ONLY gun with the combo of Trench Barrel and One-Two Punch, definitely try to pick one up as the two perks do synergize quite well! Otherwise, the extremely rare combo of Discord and Redirection can rip and tear through minor and major enemies with ease (Though I have enjoyed Discord and Destab Rounds for general add-clear too)!
Masterworks: Handling, Reload Speed

Aggressives are extremely lethal in PvP but suffer from poor stats (unfortunately, this one more than other end-game counterparts). That said, A Sudden Death does come with the battle-tested Slideshot + Opening Shot to boost those stats and accuracy. Alternatively, Threat Detector and Closing Time can be utilized too. Ultimately, this archetype has been overshadowed by Lightweights and Precisions in the Crucible.
Masterworks: Range, Handling

It's no secret that I love Stasis; so naturally, this being the first on the list is exciting! RotN Judgment trades out a few perks in each column to make some notable combos. There's the self-sustaining Headstone/Rimestealer, the classic Demolitionist/Adrenaline Junkie, or Paracausal Affinity with an easy-to-proc 20% damage buff. Stats are still a little lacking compared to other 140s in this slot, especially Stability, so be sure to prioritize a little extra there.
Masterworks: Stability, Range

Judgment has familiar 4th column perks in Opening Shot and Timed Payload, but the 3rd column perks have joined by Keep Away and Lone Wolf. I'm especially interested in obtaining a version rocking Keep Away and Opening Shot as both provide range and accuracy through the fight. As noted for PvE rolls, while this gun did get a little stat bump on re-release, it still is lacking in Stability (and Range in PvP). Focus on one or both stats and this gun should perform decently.
Masterworks: Range, Stability

Prosecutor is an Arc Precision auto rifle with a number of solid options for PvE, especially the tried and true combos of Eddy Current with Rolling Storm or Dragonfly with Voltshot (that second one is limited to Raid/Dungeon/Trials weapons). For more generic options, Subsistence and Onslaught very good pairing (though Paracausal Affinity works here too). Well-rounded stats means you can safely pick whatever Barrels and Magazines, but I'll be leaning towards Reload and Stability.
Masterworks: Reload Speed, Stability

I've always been a fan of the 450 Autos in PvP; and the Prosecutor doesn't disappoint here. Crossing Over as the origin trait, paired with 4 different non-kill-requiring perks (Keep Away or Zen Moment + Tap the Trigger or Target Lock) means this brings a lot of potency without any real requirements. I'll be looking for Keep Away and TtT but any combination will be powerful (even Eddy Current and Onslaught get honorable mentions here)! Definitely try to farm one where possible!
Masterworks: Range, Handling

High-Impact Pulse Rifles may be a little less common in PvE but don't pass up this workhorse of a gun! Firefly shows up as a 3rd column perk, granting additional reload and a Solar explosion on a precision kill. This pairs amazingly with Hatchling or Elemental Honing (you get 2 stacks if you get kill from the solar explosion). Tear and Slice are both options for applying Sever, but that's about it... seriously, just get Firefly in that 3rd column!
Masterworks: Stability, Reload Speed

Okay, this is where High-impact pulse rifles shine the most, ye olde Crucible. Take your pick of your favorite stat increasing perk in the 3rd column along with Headseeker or Closing Time for neutral game benefits or Desperado for kill chaining (psst, Firefly could work in column 3 with Desperado or Headseeker too). Since getting those two-burst kills requires all 6 shots to crit, focus on Stability and recoil via Barrel and Magazine to reduce flinch and tighten the burst.
Masterworks: Stability, Handling
